summary:
Adds a new 1 handed dawnguard hammer.
REQUIRES DAWNGUARD DLC.
descriptionHtml:
[u][size=5]REQUIRES DAWNGUARD DLC![/size][/u]

Add a one-handed Dawnguard hammer. You can get the weapon from Gunmar.
The weapon can be tempered with 1 steel ingot.

If you have any retextures of the Dawnguard warhammer they will also be applied to this weapon.

To do:
- Dawnguard rune hammer

[b]Check my other mods[/b]
-"1-handed" series
